title: Yorick not in free rotation ?
body: Why is yorick never in the free champion rotation for OCE ?

replies.body:
Yorick will be put onto the champion rotation after his rework

And actually 4 champs don't appear, {{champion:78}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:18}} don't appear.

Poppy is in the same boat as yorick, and will appear after reworks (sometime between now and the end of January, taric as well)

Alistar and Tristana don't appear because you can get them fro free from riots YouTube and Facebook
I thought the Alistar promo didn't work for OCE?
You have to send a support ticket

Because he is one of the most UNUSED champions in the game.
The free week is meant to expose the newbie and experienced players alike to new champions that Riot think are good or are very frequently played in this game.

Yorick is a good champion, but he isn't played enough to go onto the free week, sadly.

{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:83}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
um bud then why is panth on this week

Pantheon is used doe...
Alot more than Yorick

Swain. Wasnt Swain on 3 - 1 month ago?

I'm sure (educated guess) that they only put the same champions every month / 3 weeks.
Then again I'm not so sure.

Btw, I'm sure people have bought swain and pantheon. I've bought Panth, but not swain sadly.

Yeah, but no one actually plays Swain... I've seen more Yorick players than Swain players.

Oh, and Malzahar. He was on and now I have him, but I barely ever see any other players. Only once ever when not on free week. I've seen around 4-5 Yoricks, 1 Malzahar and 2-3 Swains ever, not including free weeks.
Yorick is loving and kind and gentle...
yorick may be, but yorick is still unloved

Doesn't that defeat the whole purpose?
of course people aren't going to play him if they don't get the chance to.

also its not 'champs riot think are good, or are frequently played' all champs except for Yorick are in the rotation.

Problem: Hmmm No one plays Yorick, how can we fix this?

Logical conclusion: MAKE SURE NO ONE EVER GETS THE CHANCE TO PLAY HIM, BY REMOVING HIM FROM CHAMP ROTATION.
there are other champs that aren't
i wasn't aware of that, my bad, the rest still applies tho.
